title: Topic 004 Question 104
body: On Monday, you configure an email notification in Microsoft Defender for Cloud to notify user1@contoso.com about alerts that have a severity level of Low, Medium, or High.
On Tuesday, Microsoft Defender for Cloud generates the security alerts shown in the following table.
How many email notifications will user1@contoso.com receive on Tuesday? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
